name: Explosive Pursuit
description: Explosive Pursuit - a game where you have to avoid obstacles and police officers who want to catch you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
